title: Alan Is a Good Boy
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>This is my pet. A robot cat named Alan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>A robot!? That’s amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Alan is…. very smart. He won’t forget a face he saw before…. and he’s well behaved<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Is that so, he’s a good boy, huh~. Chika-chan’s Shiitake is a good girl too and is very cute~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Shiitake?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah, here’s a picture. She’s Chika-chan’s dog, she’s big, fluffy, and she has gentle eyes~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah…. I think I heard about her before from Ayumu-san…. Hey…. I want to hear more…. about Shiitake. So, uhh…. would you…. like to come to play at my house? Alan is really cute.… and I have a lot of games<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby wants to go! Ruby wants to stay over at your house, Rina-chan…. Would that be bad?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>N-, not at all! It’s fine! Rina-chan’s board「Sparkling」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe, let’s play and talk a lot, Rina-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
